评论详情: These pants are cute they run a little long.

These seems to made well enough to fit the price point but this fabric doesn't look like it would wear well/wash well and would pill easily. That being said, I purchased these for my much shorter daughter and after pulling them out from their package, I realize they run very large. Very very large. So much so that a 6ft size 8 could fit in them instead of a petite youth.

Pants originally ordered were white and the bottom strings were functional but needed to reorder a different size.  The reordered pants received were not white… ivory… and the bottom strings were attached at the inseam.

They’re very thick material and a hole formed by the pocket seam the second time I wore them. The material makes them pretty heavy and they are tight in the thighs and loose everywhere else so it’s a bit uncomfortable to sit down. The didn’t shrink or anything when washed the first time but I don’t think I’ll be wearing them very much anyways.

评论详情: I normally wear a 12/14 and the XL didn’t even come close to buttoning. I’m 5’10 and the length seemed fine, but these were definitely not high waisted.
I ordered a size too big! I’m 5”2 on the hippy side & These pants look like bell bottoms instead baggy cargo look.

After searching high and low for cargo pants, I thought I finally found a pair that would compliment my wardrobe. The sizing was pretty spot on. I am 5’9 weighing 170 lbs, and have a pretty casually athletic build. A size Large fit perfectly around my waist, and the length came past my ankles. I loved the pants until I tried to wear them to work one day. I got many compliments. BUT….the pants design were not practical. I struggled with trying not to trip over the thick rope material located on both inner ankles. The strings were too long and bulky to be hidden and discreet when you are walking or taking your stride, so be careful. I actually stumbled a few times throughout the day and I was wearing sneakers. I found myself stepping on the rope even after putting a knot in them. Unfortunately, they are not drawstrings and stay at that length, which makes it hard to modify them. It was too late to request a return code so I could get my money back, but if I could then I definitely would. Again, great fit and sizing, but not practical for casual use.
I’m 5’9 200lbs curvy and the XL didn’t close on my waist. The length was right at the floor and did not drag
I am 5'7 and a little curvy. These pants did not fit me at all. I could not get it past my thighs.

So if you have thick thighs and a bigger ass size up sadly they only have till xl so any bigger you need to find them somewhere. Everything is amazing on them they are just smaller on that area an sadly no stretch. Personally for me I am 5’6 it was just enough baggy fit amazing on my legs and thighs but it wouldn’t go any further up my ass unless I wanted to rip the pants it was bit of a squeeze in my thighs but nothing bad it was really just my ass part that didn’t want to budge
